name: Act The Cat
description:
Story

Old general Cat must activate big robocat to conquer the Earth. Unfortunately he has no more secret agents but two office cat clerks. They promise to do the best. They found the red big button at the robohead, but obviously they failed this mission. Now they should return back to the top of robocat.

Object of the game:

You have to reach the top of the screen jumping on the old sofa. Landing on the sofa during jump will increase your jump height. If you bump into any object you lose the amplitude of your jump. You should also be afraid of angry habitants throwing different stuff from their windows.

Controls:

  • Arrow Left - Move Left
  • Arrow Right - Move Right
  • Esc- Exit

Warning: please click the mouse on the game screen to activate controls in the start.

Requirements: recommended browsers Chrome, Firefox.

Facebook community for feedback and development.
